nodes.text: Introducing Incom's T-65 "X-Wing" Space Superiority Fighter

Introducing Incom's T-65 "X-Wing" Space Superiority Fighter was a printed advertisement for the T-65 X-wing starfighter by the Incom Corporation that was issued in copies of the Galactic Defense Review publication in circulation prior to Incom being nationalized by the Galactic Empire in 1 BBY. The advertisement had blueprints of the starfighter in the background as well as supplying detailed information on the technical innovations of the starfighter, including improved targeting computers, engines, and life support systems.
